name: Bea (Pokemon) LoRA [8 MB]
description:
This is a LoRA for Bea from Pokemon.

I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 weight for best results.

These Images were generated with Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix using OrangeMix VAE. This was trained on the NAI Model.

Make sure to always add - bea \(pokemon\)

It was trained on pictures with Bea with blue and grey eyes - It will naturally jump between the two but you can force one eye color with grey eyes or blue eyes.

If you wish to place her in her traditional clothes, use this in the prompt - <lora:Bea-000018:0.9>, bea \(pokemon\), bodysuit, bodysuit under clothes, print shirt, print shorts.

This model works best with her traditional clothes. You can dress her in other clothes but sometimes - It will place sponsorship on it. You're that loyal.

Embeds and LoRAs used - Bad Prompt

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
